text: <@U056ZR8LVJQ> - I have the same request.  I submitted via that form 10 days ago (week before Thanksgiving week).  Haven't heard a reply yet.  How can I find an update on our request status?  Perhaps I put wrong IDs a swell?
<@U048G8M7Z7W> unfortunately I don't have access to this review queue or process
oh, sorry - i saw your first reply on this thread.  Any ideas where/how I can find out?
I tried chatting with the support system inside HubSpot this am, and got nowhere.

Re-reading, maybe it was <@UDDJG2VFG> that answered?  Sorry for tagging people - but I'm not sure how to move forward with this.  We're blocked on adding this feature to our app, and I'd like to get some idea of what I do next.
I think you should receive an email when the request is made with a group inbox that is probably best to followup with
Haven't received anything.  The submission looked fine - no evidence of errors.  I guess I'll resubmit. :disappointed:
There's no way anyone can see if there's a request in queue?  Or if it was rejected/accepted?
No I don't believe so, only updates via email
